mapper.insert: INSERT INTO scoop_goal (key, wsid, gname, gstartdate,genddate, gstatus, uowner, gpublic, gmember, gfinish, gcreator) VALUES (key_seq.nextval, #{wsid}, #{gname}, #{gstartdate},#{genddate}, #{gstatus}, #{uowner}, #{gpublic}, #{gmember} , #{gfinish},#{gcreator})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM scoop_goal WHERE gcreator = #{gcreator} and wsid=#{wsid}
